```{r, message=FALSE}
library(HistData)
library(tidyverse)
library(zeallot)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
# Set the working directory to where the CSV file is located
setwd("C:/Users/weyen/OneDrive/Documents/Warhawk Softball/Warhawk-Softball")

# Import the CSV file using read.csv()
wh <- read.csv("2022 GSC SOFTBALL HITTING.csv")
wh

summary(wh)
c(q1,md,mm,q3)%<-%summary(wh)[2:5]
mad_values <- apply(wh[, 2:ncol(wh)], 2, mad)
mad_values
iqr<-q3<-q1
apply(wh[, 2:ncol(wh)], 2, fivenum)
#fivenum(wh)[2:5]
#m <- sum(wh)/length(wh)

bp_AVG<-wh %>% 
  ggplot(aes(AVG)) +
  geom_boxplot(color="orange", fill="black", size=1, outlier.shape = 7)

qq_AVG<-ggplot(wh, aes(sample = AVG)) +
  geom_qq()

d_AVG<-wh %>% ggplot(aes(AVG)) +
  geom_density(fill="orange", adjust=.05)+ggtitle("Density Plot")

h_AVG<-wh %>% 
  ggplot(aes(AVG)) + 
  geom_histogram(color='black', fill='orange')+ggtitle("Histogram")

b_AVG<-wh %>% ggplot(aes(AVG)) + geom_bar(color= 'orange', fill='black')+ggtitle("Barplot")

grid.arrange(bp_AVG,qq_AVG,d_AVG,h_AVG,b_AVG, ncol = 3, nrow=2 )
```
